easy.a: A compass needle or arrow on a map (pointer)

medium.q: I am a word that hides inside many phrases, and I can switch places with a sister word to change meaning. What word am I?
medium.hint: Used to connect clauses; can also contrast ideas.

hard.q: A librarian has three shelves labeled A, B, and C. Each shelf has a different number of books: A has 3, B has 5 more than A, and C has 2 fewer than B. How many books are on shelf C?
hard.hint: Compute step by step: A=3, B=A+5, C=B-2.
